fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: At any time in the game you can publicly announce that you are the Tuwncoat and join an evil team of choice

fields.name: Passive:
fields.value:
You always know any REF currently alive in the game, but not how many members
You cannot be protected from dying, unless you have activated your ability, which will grant you basic defense the current night or next night, depeding if this was activated at day or night.
